name: Truth or Dare Shoutout - iPad
description:
Truth or Dare Shoutout - iPad Edition

Great game for everyone,

How to play:
1) Add the players names (Up to 8 Players)
2) Shake your device or click the dice and it will pick a player at random
3) Ask them the question "Truth or Dare"
4) Press the relevant button

Hours of fun for everyone

App features:
*Has lots of dares & truth questions
*Can add unto 8 players
*Shake your iPad to pick a player
*Can set a timer
*Can change the timer seconds to give them more time
*Can share the truth or dares on Facebook & twitter

Produced by www.slinkyapps.co.uk

You can also follow us on twitter

http://www.twitter.com/slinkyapps
